extension_description.message: Enables you to insert an image of your choice to the background of search pages (Google, bing, Yahoo! JAPAN).

options_title.description: The title of the options page

no_image.description: The text indicated in image selector when no image selected

options_section_1_title.description: The title of the 1st section of the options page

tab_local_label.description: The label of the tab to load images from local machine

tab_clipboard_label.description: The label of the tab to load images from clipboard

tab_all_clear_label.description: The label of the tab to remove all images

tab_local_description_1.message: Loads images from your local machine.
tab_local_description_1.description: The description of the tab to load images from local machine (1)

tab_local_button.description: The label of the button in the tab to load images from local machine

tab_clipboard_description_1.message: Loads an image copied to the clipboard.
tab_clipboard_description_1.description: The description of the tab to load images from clipboard (1)

tab_clipboard_description_2.message: The permission of reading the clipboard is needed. You will be asked when clicking below button for the first time.
tab_clipboard_description_2.description: The description of the tab to load images from clipboard (2)

tab_clipboard_button.description: The label of the button in the tab to load images from clipboard

tab_all_clear_description_1.description: The description of the tab to remove all images (The big warning text)

tab_all_clear_description_2.description: The description of the tab to remove all images (2)

tab_all_clear_button.description: The label of the button in the tab to remove all images

tab_all_clear_confirm.description: The message of the tab to remove all images to confirm

options_section_1_note_1.message: It is recommended to select images with a screen ratio equal to or close to that of your screen.
options_section_1_note_1.description: The note of the 1st section of the options page (1)

options_section_1_note_2.message: It recommended to select images with a high resolution.
options_section_1_note_2.description: The note of the 1st section of the options page (2)

options_section_1_note_3.description: The note of the 1st section of the options page (3)

options_section_1_note_4.message: If you select multiple images, one images will displayed at random each time you visit target page.
options_section_1_note_4.description: The note of the 1st section of the options page (4)

options_section_1_note_5.message: You can remove images by clicking them.
options_section_1_note_5.description: The note of the 1st section of the options page (5)

options_section_2_title.description: The title of the 2nd section of the options page

sample_page_search_text.description: The text indicated on the search bar in the sample page

sample_page_search_icon.description: The icon indicated on the search bar in the sample page

sample_page_site_title.description: The titles of the sites in the sample page (all are in common)

sample_page_site_description.message: Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample
sample_page_site_description.description: The descriptions of the sites in the sample page (all are in common)

sample_page_side_panel_title.description: The title of the side panel in the sample page

sample_page_side_panel_pronounce.description: Pronounce of the side panel in the sample page

sample_page_side_panel_description.message: Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample Sample
sample_page_side_panel_description.description: The description of the side panel in the sample page

sample_page_side_panel_related_titles.description: The titles of the related items in the side panel in the sample page

image_size_title.description: The title of the image sizing option

image_size_zoom_in.message: Shrink to fit whole of the image
image_size_zoom_in.description: The option to shrink the image in the image sizing option

image_size_zoom_out.message: Enlarge to hide margins whole of the image
image_size_zoom_out.description: The option to enlarge the image in the image sizing option

image_align_title.description: The title of the image pivot option

image_align_description.message: Select a reference point when enlarging images.
image_align_description.description: The description of the image pivot option

image_align_ul.description: One of the reference points of the images (top-left)

image_align_uc.description: One of the reference points of the images (top)

image_align_ur.description: One of the reference points of the images (top-right)

image_align_cl.description: One of the reference points of the images (left)

image_align_cc.description: One of the reference points of the images (center)

image_align_cr.description: One of the reference points of the images (right)

image_align_bl.description: One of the reference points of the images (bottom-left)

image_align_bc.description: One of the reference points of the images (bottom)

image_align_br.description: One of the reference points of the images (bottom-right)

image_opacity.description: The title of the image opacity option

image_opacity_warning.message: Some images may reduce page visibility.
image_opacity_warning.description: The warning text of the image opacity option

image_shadow.description: The title of the image shadow option

options_section_2_note_1.description: The note of the 2nd section of the options page (1)

options_section_2_note_2.message: You can resize the preview by dragging the blue borders
options_section_2_note_2.description: The note of the 2nd section of the options page (2)

options_section_2_note_3.message: You can change the images of the preview by clicking buttons below the preview.
options_section_2_note_3.description: The note of the 2nd section of the options page (3)

options_section_2_note_4.message: Please adjust opacity to keep visibility.
options_section_2_note_4.description: The note of the 2nd section of the options page (4)

save_description.message: Please click the right "Save" button to save changes.
save_description.description: The description of the foot to prompt to save

options_section_3_title.description: The title of the 3rd section of the options page

options_section_3_subsection_1_title.description: The title of the 1st sub-section of the 3rd section of the options page

hide_side_panel_label.description: The label of the checkbox to the hide side panel

hide_side_panel_help_1.message: This feature is for those for whom the background image is more important than the side panel.
hide_side_panel_help_1.description: The help description of the function to hide the side panel (1)

hide_side_panel_help_2.message: The button to show the side panel again will appears in the target page if the side panel is hidden.
hide_side_panel_help_2.description: The help description of the function to hide the side panel (2)

options_section_3_subsection_2_title.description: The title of the 2nd sub-section of the 3rd section of the options page

hide_seasonal_illust_label.description: The label of the checkbox to hide the anniversary illust

hide_seasonal_illust_help_1.message: It means the illust which appears behind the top search bar during some anniversaries or seasonal events.
hide_seasonal_illust_help_1.description: The help description of the function to hide the anniversary illust (1)

hide_seasonal_illust_help_2.message: This feature is under the test and may not work correctly.
hide_seasonal_illust_help_2.description: The help description of the function to hide the anniversary illust (2)

save_button.description: The label fo the save button

process_dialog_update.description: The message of the process dialog when updating data structure

process_dialog_load.description: The message of the process dialog when loading images

process_dialog_saving.description: The message of the process dialog when saving images

process_dialog_save_done.description: The message of the process dialog when complete saving

error_invalid_files.message: Some selected files are not image. These files will be skipped.
error_invalid_files.description: The error message when including non-image files

error_no_clipboard_permission.message: Could not read the clipboard because of no permission to read it.
error_no_clipboard_permission.description: The error message when don't have a permission to read clipboard

error_no_clipboard_image.message: The data read from the clipboard is not image.
error_no_clipboard_image.description: The error message when no image in the clipboard

message_unsaved_changes.message: There are unsaved changes. These will be lost if you leave this page. Do you want to proceed?
message_unsaved_changes.description: The message shown when leaving page with unsaved changes (Actually, Chrome doesn't show this message)

show_side_panel_label.description: The label of the button to show the side panel again
